languages.text: "Не хочу говорить дурно о Теодоре, но ты ведешь себя с людьми куда благороднее и милостивее, чем она. Под твоей рукой протекторат процветает, а люди тобой восхищаются. Если это так, то какая разница, что я думаю?"

"I wish not to speak ill of Theodora, but you treat people with far more grace and nobility than she ever did. Guided by your hand, your protectorate flourishes and your people extol you. And if it is so, then what does my opinion matter?"
languages.original_text: "Не хочу говорить дурно о Теодоре, но ты ведешь себя с людьми куда благороднее и милостивее, чем она. Под твоей рукой протекторат процветает, а люди тобой восхищаются. Если это так, то какая разница, что я думаю?"

traits.locale_text: "I wish not to speak ill of Theodora, but you treat people with far more grace and nobility than she ever did. Guided by your hand, your protectorate flourishes and your people extol you. And if it is so, then what does my opinion matter?"
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

traits.locale_text: "I wish not to speak ill of Theodora, but you treat people with far more grace and nobility than she ever did. Guided by your hand, your protectorate flourishes and your people extol you. And if it is so, then what does my opinion matter?"

traits.locale_text: "I wish not to speak ill of Theodora, but you treat people with far more grace and nobility than she ever did. Guided by your hand, your protectorate flourishes and your people extol you. And if it is so, then what does my opinion matter?"
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

traits.locale_text: "I wish not to speak ill of Theodora, but you treat people with far more grace and nobility than she ever did. Guided by your hand, your protectorate flourishes and your people extol you. And if it is so, then what does my opinion matter?"
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

traits.locale_text: "I wish not to speak ill of Theodora, but you treat people with far more grace and nobility than she ever did. Guided by your hand, your protectorate flourishes and your people extol you. And if it is so, then what does my opinion matter?"
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: "Ich will nicht schlecht von Theodora reden, aber Ihr begegnet den Leuten mit weit mehr Gunst und Vornehmheit, als sie es je getan hat. Unter Euch blüht euer Protektorat auf und Eure Untertanen preisen Euch. Und wenn das so ist, welche Rolle spielt dann meine Meinung?"
languages.original_text: "I wish not to speak ill of Theodora, but you treat people with far more grace and nobility than she ever did. Guided by your hand, your protectorate flourishes and your people extol you. And if it is so, then what does my opinion matter?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich will nicht schlecht von Theodora reden, aber Ihr begegnet den Leuten mit weit mehr Gunst und Vornehmheit, als sie es je getan hat. Unter Euch blüht euer Protektorat auf und Eure Untertanen preisen Euch. Und wenn das so ist, welche Rolle spielt dann meine Meinung?"
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: « Sans vouloir dire du mal de Théodora, vous traitez votre prochain avec plus de bienveillance et de noblesse qu'elle ne l'a jamais fait. Guidé par votre main, votre protectorat prospère et vos gens vous en rendent grâce. Face à un tel constat, qu'importe mon opinion ? »
languages.original_text: "I wish not to speak ill of Theodora, but you treat people with far more grace and nobility than she ever did. Guided by your hand, your protectorate flourishes and your people extol you. And if it is so, then what does my opinion matter?"

traits.locale_text: « Sans vouloir dire du mal de Théodora, vous traitez votre prochain avec plus de bienveillance et de noblesse qu'elle ne l'a jamais fait. Guidé par votre main, votre protectorat prospère et vos gens vous en rendent grâce. Face à un tel constat, qu'importe mon opinion ? »
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: 「シオドーラを悪く言うつもりはない。だが、あなたはシオドーラよりもはるかに優雅かつ高貴な態度で人々に接している。その手に導かれてあなたの保護領は栄えており、民はあなたを称賛している。そうであるならば、私の意見など大したことでもないだろう？」
languages.original_text: "I wish not to speak ill of Theodora, but you treat people with far more grace and nobility than she ever did. Guided by your hand, your protectorate flourishes and your people extol you. And if it is so, then what does my opinion matter?"

traits.locale_text: 「シオドーラを悪く言うつもりはない。だが、あなたはシオドーラよりもはるかに優雅かつ高貴な態度で人々に接している。その手に導かれてあなたの保護領は栄えており、民はあなたを称賛している。そうであるならば、私の意見など大したことでもないだろう？」
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: «No es mi intención faltar a Theodora, pero usted trata a la gente con mucha más dignidad y nobleza que ella. Bajo su guía, su protectorado ha prosperado y su gente canta sus alabanzas. Siendo así, ¿qué importa mi opinión?».
languages.original_text: "I wish not to speak ill of Theodora, but you treat people with far more grace and nobility than she ever did. Guided by your hand, your protectorate flourishes and your people extol you. And if it is so, then what does my opinion matter?"

traits.locale_text: «No es mi intención faltar a Theodora, pero usted trata a la gente con mucha más dignidad y nobleza que ella. Bajo su guía, su protectorado ha prosperado y su gente canta sus alabanzas. Siendo así, ¿qué importa mi opinión?».
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: “我不想说西奥多拉的坏话，但你待人的方式确实比她优雅、高尚得多。在你的指引下，你的王朝欣欣向荣，你的臣民对你心悦诚服。既然如此，我的看法又何足挂齿呢？”
languages.original_text: "I wish not to speak ill of Theodora, but you treat people with far more grace and nobility than she ever did. Guided by your hand, your protectorate flourishes and your people extol you. And if it is so, then what does my opinion matter?"

traits.locale_text: “我不想说西奥多拉的坏话，但你待人的方式确实比她优雅、高尚得多。在你的指引下，你的王朝欣欣向荣，你的臣民对你心悦诚服。既然如此，我的看法又何足挂齿呢？”
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: "Theodora'nın arkasından kötü konuşmak istemiyorum ama sen insanlara çok daha saygılı ve asil davranıyorsun. Protektoran senin yönetimin altında serpiliyor ve tebaan sana methiyeler diziyor. Durum böyleyken benim fikrimin ne önemi var ki?"
languages.original_text: "I wish not to speak ill of Theodora, but you treat people with far more grace and nobility than she ever did. Guided by your hand, your protectorate flourishes and your people extol you. And if it is so, then what does my opinion matter?"
